code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Form}from'react-bootstrap';import{useLocation,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SearchBox(){const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState('');let navigate=useNavigate();let location=useLocation();const submitHandler=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(keyword){navigate("/?keyword=".concat(keyword,"&page=1"));}else{navigate(location.pathname);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Form,{onSubmit:submitHandler,className:"d-flex",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"search",name:"q",onChange:e=>setKeyword(e.target.value),className:"me-2",placeholder:"Search2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-success",type:"submit",children:"Search"})]});}export default SearchBox;
